content.text:
# Austin Film Critics Association Awards 2020

16th AFCA Awards
----
Best Film:
Minari
The 16th Austin Film Critics Association Awards, honoring the best in filmmaking for 2020, were announced on March 19, 2021.
Winners and nominees
{| class=wikitable style="width=100%"
|-
!style="width=50%"|Best Film
!style="width=50%"|Best Director
|-
| valign="top" |
# Minari
# Nomadland
# Promising Young Woman
# First Cow
# Never Rarely Sometimes Always
# One Night in Miami...
# Palm Springs and Sound of Metal (TIE)
# The Invisible Man and Mank (TIE)
| valign="top" |
* 'Lee Isaac Chung – Minari'
** Emerald Fennell – Promising Young Woman
** Eliza Hittman – Never Rarely Sometimes Always
** Kelly Reichardt – First Cow
** Chloé Zhao – Nomadland
|-
!style="width=50%"|Best Actor
!style="width=50%"|Best Actress
|-
| valign="top" |
* 'Riz Ahmed – Sound of Metal'
** Chadwick Boseman – ''Ma Rainey's Black Bottom
** Anthony Hopkins – The Father
** Delroy Lindo – Da 5 Bloods
** Steven Yeun – Minari
| valign="top" |
* 'Carey Mulligan – Promising Young Woman'
** Nicole Beharie – Miss Juneteenth
** Viola Davis – Ma Rainey's Black Bottom
** Frances McDormand – Nomadland
** Elisabeth Moss – The Invisible Man
|-
!style="width=50%"|Best Supporting Actor
!style="width=50%"|Best Supporting Actress
|-
| valign="top" |
* 'Daniel Kaluuya – Judas and the Black Messiah'
** Leslie Odom Jr. – One Night in Miami...
** Paul Raci – Sound of Metal
** David Strathairn – Nomadland
** Glynn Turman – Ma Rainey's Black Bottom
| valign="top" |
* 'Youn Yuh-jung – Minari'
** Maria Bakalova – Borat Subsequent Moviefilm
** Olivia Colman – The Father
** Amanda Seyfried – Mank
** Helena Zengel – News of the World
|-
!style="width=50%"|Best Original Screenplay
!style="width=50%"|Best Adapted Screenplay
|-
| valign="top" |
* 'Minari – Lee Isaac Chung'
** Palm Springs – Andy Siara
** Promising Young Woman - Emerald Fennell
** Sound of Metal – Darius Marder and Abraham Marder
** The Trial of the Chicago 7 – Aaron Sorkin
| valign="top" |
* 'Nomadland – Chloé Zhao'
** The Father – Florian Zeller and Christopher Hampton
** The Invisible Man – Leigh Whannell
** Ma Rainey's Black Bottom – Ruben Santiago-Hudson
** One Night in Miami... – Kemp Powers
|-
!style="width=50%"|Best Film Editing
!style="width=50%"|Best Ensemble
|-
| valign="top" |
* 'Nomadland - Chloé Zhao'
** The Father - Yorgos Lamprinos
** Mank - Kirk Baxter
** Tenet – Jennifer Lame
** Sound of Metal – Mikkel E.G. Nielsen
| valign="top" |
* Minari
** Da 5 Bloods
** Ma Rainey's Black Bottom
** One Night in Miami...
** The Trial of the Chicago 7
|-
!style="width=50%"|Best Animated Film
!style="width=50%"|Best Foreign Language Film
|-
| valign="top" |
* Wolfwalkers
** Onward
** Over the Moon
** A Shaun the Sheep Movie: Farmageddon
** Soul
| valign="top" |
* Minari
** Another Round
** Bacurau
** Beanpole
** La Llorona
|-
!style="width=50%"|Best First Film

|-
| valign="top" |

** Miss Juneteenth
** One Night in Miami...
** Palm Springs

** Crip Camp
** Dick Johnson Is Dead

| valign="top" |

** Tenet – Ludwig Göransson

** Birds of Prey

* 'Elisabeth Moss - The Invisible Man'
** Luke Davis - The Invisible Man
** Andrew Jackson - Tenet
** Oliver Jackson-Cohen - The Invisible Man
** Matt Kasmir - The Midnight Sky
** Terry Notary - The Call of the Wild
|-
!style="width=50%"|Bobby McCurdy Memorial Breakthrough Artist Award
!style="width=50%"|Austin Film Award
|-
| valign="top" |
* 'Radha Blank – The 40-Year-Old Version'
** Lee Isaac Chung – Minari
** Sidney Flanigan – Never Rarely Sometimes Always
** Alan S. Kim – Minari
** Cathy Yan – Birds of Prey
| valign="top" |
* 'Greenland – Ric Roman Waugh'
** Bull – Annie Silverstein
** The Orange Years – Adam Sweeney
** Pahokee – Patrick Bresnan and Ivete Lucas
** We Can Be Heroes – Robert Rodriguez
|-
! colspan="2" | Special Honorary Award
|-
| colspan=2 valign="top" width="50%"|
* Honoring Miss Juneteenth with a "Texas Spirit" award, for exemplifying the creative output of the film industry here in the Lone Star State, as well as embodying the character of our community.''
|}
